page.title: 06SERVICES IN THE DALE.
page.content: In Horsshouse we find the village Post Office/General Store,this P.O.is a Non Cash Account Office,i.e.people cannot pay telephone bills or use P.O. Saving Accounts,but it does pay out all State Benifits & sells stamps etc. The General Store,this sells just about everything offering a weekly Tuesday delivery service to those out side the village.Inorder to provide this service fortnightly 120mile round trip to Leeds is made to purchase items. The only items delivered to the shop Bread once per week & Milk 3times No doorstep delivery of milk in area. The Postman delivers by van,bring post & daily newspapers arriving 9.30_10.30 Sunday papers the Shopkeeper collects from Middleham 7miles delivers back to village other people collect after 10.30am.from the shop.
